title: Exclusive: Italy coach Conor O'Shea warns World Rugby it must not reschedule Japan vs Scotland clash
text:
Italy head coach Conor O’Shea has warned World Rugby they must not reschedule or relocate Scotland's crunch match with Japan on Sunday after his own side's tie with New Zealand was called off due to Typhoon Hagibis.

Italy would have needed to beat New Zealand by a bonus point on Saturday to progress in second place in Pool B, but were eliminated after the game - due to be played in Toyota - was scrapped.

Scotland need to beat Japan by a bonus point to book their place in the quarter-finals and have threatened legal action in the event of the match not going ahead as scheduled in Yokohama. There have also been calls for the game to either be put back 24 hours, or relocated to an unaffected part...
description: Italy head coach Conor O’Shea has warned World Rugby they must not reschedule or relocate Scotland's crunch match with Japan on Sunday after his own side's tie with New Zealand was called off due to Typhoon Hagibis.
